stimulusHtml: Assume the marginal propensity to consume is 0.8. How will a decrease in taxes of $100 billion and a decrease in government spending of $100 billion affect aggregate demand?
choicesHtml: Aggregate demand will decrease by $900 billion.
Aggregate demand will decrease by $500 billion.
Aggregate demand will decrease by $400 billion.
Aggregate demand will decrease by $100 billion.
